description: A forested trial area within Upper Yard overseen by Priest Satori. The area is filled with floating Surprise Clouds containing various items and has a survival rate of only 10%.

keyEvents.title: Entering the Ordeal of Balls
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp choose and enter the Ordeal of Balls gate, beginning their trial.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the Straw Hats first encounter one of Enel's priests and experience Mantra.

keyEvents.title: Satori's Appearance
keyEvents.description: Satori appears in his domain to confront the intruders.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of the priest who oversees this ordeal.

keyEvents.title: Battle Against Satori
keyEvents.description: The battle between the Straw Hats and Satori intensifies throughout the ordeal area.
keyEvents.significance: First major priest battle in the Skypiea arc.

statusHistory.reason: Trial area operational under Satori's control
